metadata.paper_name: Development of Carbide-Reinforced Al-7075 Multi-Layered Composites via Friction Stir Additive Manufacturing
metadata.sample_id: Al-7075/SiC and Al-7075/TiC seven-layer FSAM composites

process_parameters.process_description: Seven-layer friction stir additive manufacturing of carbide-reinforced Al-7075 using groove-based nanoparticle incorporation and forced air cooling

microstructure_outputs.final_grain_size: 2.14 µm (SiC, as-welded); 1.25 µm (TiC, as-welded); 2.30 µm (SiC, PWHT); 1.30 µm (TiC, PWHT)
microstructure_outputs.phase_transformation_details: Precipitate dissolution during FSAM followed by reprecipitation during PWHT

mechanical_outputs.measured_hardness: 88.6 HV (SiC, as-welded); 93.7 HV (TiC, as-welded); 155.5 HV (SiC, PWHT); 159.12 HV (TiC, PWHT)
mechanical_outputs.ultimate_tensile_strength: 236.34 MPa (SiC, as-welded); 263.02 MPa (TiC, as-welded); 286.49 MPa (SiC, PWHT); 313.46 MPa (TiC, PWHT)
